mapper.select: SELECT s.status_no, s.member_no, s.posting_no, s.first_pass, s.final_pass, s.resume_no, s.interview_date, m.member_id, m.member_name, m.member_sex, m.member_hp, m.member_email FROM member m JOIN application_status s ON m.member_no = s.member_no WHERE s.status_no = #{status_no}

SELECT a.member_no, a.resume_no, r.resume_title, r.profile_orgname, r.profile_savname, r.resume_money, r.resume_skill, r.resume_orgname, r.resume_savname, r.resume_url FROM application_status a JOIN resume r ON a.resume_no = r.resume_no WHERE r.resume_no = #{resume_no}
